name: RunNotebook
description: Runs a Jupyter Notebook and saves the output as HTML.
helpMarkDown:
The experimental *Run Jupyter Notebook* task will use Jupyter to execute an `.ipynb` file and store the output as HTML.

For best results, it is recommended to create a conda environment that includes at least `nbconvert` and whatever kernels your notebooks require (for example, `ipykernel` for Python).
author: Steve Dower

inputs.name: notebook
inputs.label: Notebook
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the notebook(s) to execute.

inputs.name: outputdir
inputs.label: Output Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder where HTML output will be written.

inputs.name: jupyter
inputs.label: Path to Jupyter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of an installed `jupyter.exe` that also includes `nbconvert`.
